verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Does Jesus care when my heart is pained Too deeply for mirth and song; As the burdens press and the cares distress, And the way grows weary and long?

verse.name: c
verse.lines: O yes, He cares; I know He cares, His heart is touched with my grief; When the days are weary, the long nights dreary, I know my Savior cares.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Does Jesus care when my way is dark With a nameless dread and fear? As the daylight fades into deep night shades, Does He care enough to be near?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Does Jesus care when I’ve tried and failed To resist some temptation strong; When for my deep grief there is no relief, Tho' my tears flow all the night long?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Does Jesus care when I’ve said "goodbye" To the dearest on earth to me, And my sad heart aches till it nearly breaks—- Is it aught to Him? Does He see?
